Failure to demonstrate compliance will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive, and be given no further consideration. description: The Department of National Defence (DND), Canadian Forces Base Borden (CFB), Ontario Fitness and Sports department (F&S), on behalf of the Administration Branch, have a requirement for a standing offer of new commercial weight equipment in the fitness facilities. The Contractor must supply, deliver, assemble, install and provide training of commercial weight equipment.  The contract must also provide general maintenance and training to F&S maintenance staff. The training will be within thirty business days of delivery of the equipment.  Bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criteria. Failure to demonstrate compliance will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive, and be given no further consideration.  AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-07-07 by 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Gym Equipment

**Document Title:** W0013-23CS38 Gym Equipment
**Solicitation Number:** WS3966350686
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-01
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-07T14:00:00

**Procurement Overview:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a standing offer for new commercial weight equipment in fitness facilities at Canadian Forces Base Borden, Ontario. The contractor will supply, deliver, assemble, install, and provide training for the commercial weight equipment, as well as general maintenance and training to maintenance staff.

**Key Requirements:**

* Supply, deliver, assemble, and install commercial weight equipment
* Provide training for the equipment within 30 business days of delivery
* Provide general maintenance and training to maintenance staff
* Demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criterion

**Standards and Preferences:**

* Competitive Bidding Method
* Lowest Price Selection Criterion
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Other Free Trade Agreements applicable to this procurement

**Implementation:**

* Tender closing date: 2023-07-07T14:00:00
* All required documentation and bids must be submitted by the closing date and time to be considered

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Christopher Harvey
* Title: [Title not specified]
* Email: christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (519) 671-2396

Note: Avoid using 1st person or direct address, if this is requested:

hi team
thank you sincerely

Replace with more formal expressions:

we appreciate your feedback
please contact us via email or phone

Do all the research and suggest any request for clarification needed. Also, ensure spelling, grammar and punctuation are accurate!  #TechnicalWritingEditRequest #GovermentTendder #CanadianGovernment #Languages EdgarZeigler.
